list.title: Swift & Lean CDN
list.description: This one has 3 image, english, malayalam(actually french) and italian

list.title: Design Freedom
list.description: This one has two images, one hindi and arabic

list.title: One URL per visual
list.description: No need to maintain multiple URLs for thumbnails/images of different sizes. Just upload a high resolution image and let imageOpt take care of serving as many different size images as needed.

list.title: Crop or Fit
list.description: Request for an image that should be cropped to view size, or for an image that fits in the view. Ex: List view requires cropped image for consistent look and full screen view requires image to fit in the view for detailed look.

list.title: Crop Options
list.description: Each image has important areas. For each image that is uploaded we provide options to choose which sides of image to retain while cropping. This option depends on image content, the clients are agnostic to this.

list.title: Localized images
list.description: imageOpt enables localization of images, add images of different languages to imageSet, using one URL and a language parameter get the localized to user language
